param.name: INPUT
param.label: Tables
param.help: The resulting table inherits its field structure from the first table in this list.

param.name: SRCINFO
param.label: Add Source Information
param.help: Adds a field with the name of the original input data set.

param.name: DELETE
param.label: Delete
param.help: Deletes each input data set immediately after it has been merged, thus saving memory resources.
